value: content=Equi Terme is located close to one of the most majestic peaks of the Apuan Alps, Pizzo d'Uccello, perched on a steep hill that you just rock. The north wall of this mountain, famous among mountain climbers, seems to want to protect the small village in Lunigiana, pleasant, mysterious, full of atmosphere that only inhabited places for a long time can give: His cave, a veritable natural spectacle, gave evidence in the light of ancient presence, its marble quarries have employed hundreds of people and its spa were appreciated by the ancient Romans.

-  2 km from Massa Marittima, La Colombaia farming estate is situated in the wonderful Maremma countryside in Tuscany and comprises an 18th century farmhouse, fully restored for accommodation, made up of 8 apartments. For shared use: garden, swimming pool, garden furniture.
